channel.title: Fizzy Bang
channel.description:
Heres my First post so be nice ;D
Heres what you will need .. A bottle of coke, 2.25litre (any fizzy drink will do) A few Mentos
Heres how you do it .. First shove a few Mentos in the bottle of coke, screw the lid back on , not that tight. Shake it until pressure has built up inside the bottle. Grab the side of the bottle with 2 hands, And throw it at the ground as hard as possible. You may try this with other mints but i tried it with Mentos. You may try dropping it off a top of the building, remember only on concrete.
[glow=red,2,300]Disclaimer. I take no responsibility for possible outcomes/consequences for the trick. I take no resopnsibilty for your actions/injuries after you read this post and try it for yourself.[/glow]

item.title: Fizzy Bang
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

vbcoderx:

it works in coke, diet coke, pepsi, diet pepsi, and almost all cola’s including Dollor General Cola and Sams Choice Cola. But I have found it works better with Diet Cola. Once at my local sk8 park me and a friend got a Dollar General Diet Cola and mento’s… we dropped em in and barely got the cap on… the freaking bottle expanded real big and was starting to crack… i Took the think about to blow up and threw it across the parking lot where it blew up REALLY BIG!!! The owner( a retired pro sk8er :P) came out and everyone in the sk8park came out and was like WTF?? and Cucos ( a mexican restraunt) called the cops lol

lmao!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Fizzy Bang
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Wolfeyes217:

The mentos have no effect on the coke. just by shaking the coke up and droping it makes it a rocket lol… The only soda mentos effects is DIET coke. put it in there and see

really… so how come if i put a mentos in a bottle of normal coka cola it fizzes up?

Read full topic

item.title: Fizzy Bang
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

im from the uk. i buy a bottle of lemonade for 17p (about 50c i think) from tesco and dont bother with mints. just throw it ant the floor a few times. remember to open then close first to break the seal so the bottle doesnt split. hold near the bottom and throw hard so the bottle top hits the floor, it should crack or atleast come off, making the bottle rocket off

Read full topic

item.title: Fizzy Bang
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

This reminds me of the time I was sitting with my friends at lunch, and one of my friends has a 21 oz. bottle of pepsi. I then realised I had some mentos in my pocket, so I broke one in half under the table, and when he wasn’t looking I dropped it in.

Long story short, everyone within 5 feet was covered in pepsi.

Read full topic
